text: Eadward kingc gret Ealdred ercebiscop & Wulstan biscop & Wulfwi biscop & ealle mine heafedmen & mine þeignes & mine <scirgerefan> & ealle mine holde freond on Wigercestrescire & on Glowercestrescire & on Oxonfordescire freondlice.

Icc kiþe eow þat icc wille & icc ann þæt Sancte Peter & þa gebroðera on Westminstre habben to heora bileofan þa cotlif Perscoran & Deorhirstan mid eallum þan landum & mid eallum þan berwican þe ic habbe for minre saule alesednesse into þare haalgum stowwe gifan & aelc þære þinga þe þær to mid rihte gebirað mid circan & mid milnan, mid wuda & mid feldan, mid læse & mid hæþe, mid mæden & mid eitum, mid waterum & mid werum & mid eallum þingum swa full & swa forð swa hi on <ealdum> dagum into þære socne geled weren oððe me silfan fyrmest on handa stodan.

And ic anne hem eft alswa þæt hy habben þar to saka & soknæ, toll & team, infangenne þeof & flemenes firmðe, griðbrice & hamsocne, forsteall & miskenninge & ealle oðere gerihtu on eallum þingum þe þær upp <aspringað> inne tid & ut of tide, binnan burh & butan burhge, on stræte & of stræte.
For þæn icc nelle nateshwan geþafian þæt anig man ætbrede oððe geutige mine gife & mine ælmesse swa micell þæt sy an æker landes þæs þe on aeniges mannes dæge into þam cotlifan gebyrede.
Ne eft þæt þær ænig man aenigne onstingc habbe on ænigum þingan oððe on ænige timan be strande ne be lande <buton> se abbot & þa gebroðera into þam minstre.

& ic wille & fæstlice bebeode þæt þæs freodom & þeos mundbirdnesse beo strang & staþelfast into þære halegan stowwe Gode to lofe & Sancte Petre to wurðminte & to gewealde a on ece erfeweardnesse, Amen.
